通神学(Theosophy),一种宗教哲学,信仰一种特别的直觉知识。这种直觉知识来自于上帝,它比通过感觉经验和理性推理获得的知识更真、更有价值。(“通神学”这个词来源于.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin theosophia, from late Greek, from theosophos 'wise concerning God', from theos 'god' + sophos 'wise'

means.word_mean: 1. belief based on mystical insight into the nature of God and the soul
